item.title: Rosie Pattern Matching Language (RPL)
item.description: extract ip addresses This file defines the ip address. https://gitlab.com/rosie-pattern-language/rosie/blob/master/rpl/net.rpl 1 dmesg | rosie grep -o subs net.ipv4 7.35.177.61 7.35.177.61 Start the rosie repl with a command 1 x -d -tmc "rosie --rpl $(aqf "d=[:digit:]")repl" -nto -e ">" -s "d" -c m -a
